de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.meta

Class HiCS<V extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<OutlierResult>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.meta.HiCS<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, OutlierAlgorithm

    @Title(value="HiCS: High Contrast Subspaces for Density-Based Outlier Ranking")
 @Description(value="Algorithm to compute High Contrast Subspaces in a database as a pre-processing step for for density-based outlier ranking methods.")
 @Reference(authors="F. Keller, E. M\u00fcller, K. B\u00f6hm",
           title="HiCS: High Contrast Subspaces for Density-Based Outlier Ranking",
           booktitle="Proc. IEEE 28th Int. Conf. on Data Engineering (ICDE 2012)",
           url="https://doi.org/10.1109/ICDE.2012.88",
           bibkey="DBLP:conf/icde/KellerMB12")
public class HiCS<V extends NumberVector>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<OutlierResult>
implements OutlierAlgorithm
    Algorithm to compute High Contrast Subspaces for Density-Based Outlier Ranking.

    Reference:

    F. Keller, E. Müller, K. Böhm
    HiCS: High Contrast Subspaces for Density-Based Outlier Ranking
    Proc. IEEE 28th Int. Conf. on Data Engineering (ICDE 2012)

    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Jan Brusis, Erich Schubert
